imu-6d.description: To record a 6 degrees of freedom Intertial Measurement Unit (IMU) measurement

mg-mdps.description: Linear accelerations are stored in milli-g (mg) and angular velocities in milledegrees per second (mdps)

linear-x.description: Value of the linear x axis. Unit: mg

linear-y.description: Value of the linear y axis. Unit: mg

linear-z.description: Value of the linear z axis. Unit: mg

angular-x.description: Value of the rotational x axis. Unit: mdps

angular-y.description: Value of the rotational y axis. Unit: mdps

angular-z.description: Value of the rotational z axis. Unit: mdps
